events.title: New Year's Day
events.description: New Year's Day is the first day of the year, or January 1, in the Gregorian calendar. It is celebrated as a national holiday in many countries around the world, including the United States, Canada, the United Kingdom, and Australia. Many cultures celebrate the event in some manner and the 1st day of January is often marked as a national holiday.
